::Feline/Najah/Windlord::

Feline continued ignoring Hot Rod's trasmition. 

Najah moved and saw Hot Rod. He laughted evily and using his mega 
bazooka, he shot to Hot rod.

Windlord was around and screamed to HR "Look out!!!!" he moved 
quiclky and gave at hot rod a push.

Najah cursed  and took a feline in arms told her "We're very 
defenless here... letssss go where we can shoot maximalsss ssafely"

"That have sence, snake" she replied

Najah flew where most of alliance troops are


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> A few shots hit around him. He looked to their origin, and saw 
Feline.
> Instead of returning fire, he smiled at her, and turned away.
> He then opened his comm link on a one way channel.
> "Feline, we need to talk. Without trying to kill each other."
